RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOUGH CAT dueled early on, shook free to turn, pressured, drew clear late. RED CHILI PEPPER just off leaders to the stretch, bid stretch run, bested rest. GAPPER had a tardy start from the gate, lagged back to turn, up for show. GOT ZIP between horses early on, dueled to turn, gave in readily late. COUSIN JOE broke sharp, brief speed to the turn, gave in readily stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Cousin Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, brief speed to the turn, gave in readily stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Gapper
ENTRY.COMMENT: had a tardy start from the gate, lagged back to turn, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Got Zip
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses early on, dueled to turn, gave in readily late

ENTRY.NAME: Red Chili Pepper
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leaders to the stretch, bid stretch run, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Tough Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early on, shook free to turn, pressured, drew clear late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 15, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MABEE LUCKYNWILD backed off leaders to turn, accelerated into the stretch and went clear as much the best today. SUPORB three wide run to turn, dueled quarter pole, no match late. GENERAL GINNY unhurried to the turn, came on outside in stretch run for third. JOLIE RULER dueled early with a slight check into turn with no rail gain late. LUCKY TUESDAY inside rush to duel with nothing left through the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Tuesday
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside rush to duel with nothing left through the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: General Ginny
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the turn, came on outside in stretch run for third

ENTRY.NAME: Mabee Luckynwild
ENTRY.COMMENT: backed off leaders to turn, accelerated into stretch went clear

ENTRY.NAME: Suporb
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide run to turn, dueled quarter pole, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Jolie Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early with a slight check into turn with no rail gain late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 15, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ORB OF THE BORO quick to the front, well rationed throughout, handled well in the stretch and lasted to the wire. THIS ILL DEFEND awkward start from gate never far back, widest run slow gain. MUSTANG WILLIE bobbled at the start with no speed to stretch, cut the gap late. GAMBLER dueled to turn, chased to the stretch, weakened in the late going. CAPE MARCO DRIVE hustled along to the turn, no response in the stretch run. PER RULING FROM HIWU, ORB OF THE BORO WAS DISQUALIFIED FOR POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Mustang Willie
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Lerios Virginia
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled at the start with no speed to stretch, cut the gap late

ENTRY.NAME: Cape Marco Drive
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along to the turn, no response in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: This Ill Defend
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start from gate never far back, widest run slow gain

ENTRY.NAME: Gambler
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to turn, chased to the stretch, weakened in the late going

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Orb of the Boro
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the front, well rationed throughout, lasted to the wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 74. Starter Allowance Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 15, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Rac e Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAMI ANN raced well back to the half, rallied far turn, churned on for the nod. BELLE OF ST. JOHN speed to front, clear to far turn, dueled stretch, nailed on wire. MORNING LINE NEWS chased pace to far turn never far back, weakened in the stretch. ADDISON raced along evenly with no late response when needed. DANCE THE DAY AWAY inside trp throughout with no late kick when needed. POINT OF INFINITY never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Dance the Day Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trp throughout with no late kick when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Point of Infinity
ENTRY.COMMENT: never threatened

ENTRY.NAME: Tami Ann
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced well back to the half, rallied far turn, churned on for nod

ENTRY.NAME: Addison
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Belle of St. John
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to front, clear to far turn, dueled stretch, nailed on wire

ENTRY.NAME: Morning Line News
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to far turn never far back, weakened in the stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 29. Maiden Claiming Purse 16900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUTPOST GIRL settled back to the turn rallied to the front, cleared while ridden out to the wire. TWILIGHT BEAUTY close up off rail to turn, lugged in badly eighth pole, no match. SHEZ IN A TIZZY just off leader to the half, weakened stretch, shut off, stopped. MISS SOLAN raced along evenly while inside to the stretch run while empty. MYSTIC ANN never in the hunt while far back in the stretch run. APPALACHIAN SPIRIT brief speed, gave in readily to drop far back in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Appalachian Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Clark Rick Clark Brent W Wolfe Joe and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, gave in readily to drop far back in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Solan
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly while inside to the stretch run while empty

ENTRY.NAME: Twilight Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up off rail to turn, lugged in badly eighth pole, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Outpost Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back to the turn rallied to the front, cleared ridden out

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: JK Stable LLC, Mac Stratman & ScottBarker

ENTRY.NAME: Shez in a Tizzy
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leader to the half, weakened stretch, shut off, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Mystic Ann
ENTRY.COMMENT: never in the hunt while far back in the stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VAMONOS tracking from inside to the turn, made a three wide move to the quarter pole with a perfect trip to go clear in the final sixteenth for win 7397 at the wire to become the fifth all time rider in wins. THE POINT ROAD was a bit tardy at the break with an outside trip to the turn and grinded away in the stretch run for place spot. ALY STONE dueled to the quarter pole, could not go on and weakened late. SMART DRESSER inside duel to turn, stayed game in the stretch but weakened late. BAXTER JAX dwelt at the start, lost best chance and never menaced throughout. LIGHTNING CASHES off rail chase to the turn with nothing left in the stretch run. PER HIWU ECM2023-146 VAMONOS WAS DQD FOR A POSITIVE TEST

ENTRY.NAME: Baxter Jax
ENTRY.COMMENT: dwelt at the start, far back with no chance

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Vamonos
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracking from inside to the turn, three wide move, perfect trip

ENTRY.NAME: Lightning Cashes
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail chase to the turn with nothing left in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: The Point Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy, outside trip to the turn, grinded away for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Smart Dresser
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Hertrich III Frederick and Fielding John D
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside duel to turn, stayed game in the stretch, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Aly Stone
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to the quarter pole, could go on and weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 9100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 15, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LANALIKESCHOOCHOOS sharp break from gate, hustled to the front well rated, cleared under stout handling to the wire. SURE ENOUGH good position throughout, raced on from the turn for place spot. SOULSTONE no speed to the turn and only improved position in the stretch. NOT A ROLE MODEL raced along evenly throughout with no late kick when needed. ANN KOR chased winner to the stretch with nothing in the late going. YOU'RE A DANDY always trailed while never a menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Sure Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position throughout, raced on from the turn for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Soulstone
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn and only improved position in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Role Model
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no kick when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Ann Kor
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the stretch with nothing in the late going

ENTRY.NAME: Lanalikeschoochoos
ENTRY.OWNER: Flower City Racing LLC and Meyer Christopher J
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp break from gate, hustled to the front well rated, clear

ENTRY.NAME: You're a Dandy
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed while never a menace

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 15800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 15, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $12,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ATTA BOY ANTHONY speed to the front from inside, hounded to the half, shook free past the quarter pole to got well clear in the stretch run under good handling to the wire. SCAT SHACK three wide chase to far turn,,ran on for place spot in the stretch. J W RUCKUS hounded winne to far turn with no response in the stretch run and folded. EDEN PARADISE was antsy and unseated the rider preload, ran off into the chute, reloaded in the gate, broke well while back to the half, made a four wide bold move past the quarter pole with nothing left while used up in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Atta Boy Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the font inside, hounded to the half, shook free cleared

ENTRY.NAME: J W Ruckus
ENTRY.COMMENT: hounded winne to far turn no response in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Scat Shack
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide chase to far turn,ran on for place spot in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Eden Paradise
ENTRY.COMMENT: unseated rider preload, ran off, re-loaded trailed
